Key Match Events: Croatia secured a 1-0 victory against Poland, going level on points in Group A1 of the UEFA Nations League.
At least five fans were detained in Osijek before the match for fighting, in which a Polish national was injured.
Pre-Game Insights: Some Croatian fans were left enraged after hearing the Polish anthem right before kickoff, mistaking it for the former Yugoslav one due to their close resemblance.
Post-Match Reflections: The two sides are now equal on points in League A Group 1.
The authorities did not say exactly how many Polish nationals had been arrested.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The fights happened following Croatia's 1-0 victory against Poland.
Dozens of people have been detained and a criminal investigation is under way.
Others: The Croatian interior ministry said Polish fans attacked Croatian supporters and then took aim at police in the eastern town of Osijek.
